original_text: Though Noah, Daniel, and Job were in it, as I live, saith the Lord God, they shall deliver neither son nor daughter; they shall but deliver their own souls by their righteousness.
korean_text: 비록 노아, 다니엘, 욥이 거기에 있을지라도 나의 삶을 두고 맹세하노니 그들도 자녀는 건지지 못하고 자기의 공의로 자기의 생명만 건지리라 주 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: Though Noah, Daniel, and Job were in it
as I live, saith the Lord God
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 삶을 두고 맹세하노라 주 하나님이 말씀하시되

sentences.original_text: they shall deliver neither son nor daughter
they shall but deliver their own souls
